docs.title: Quan Yuan (袁泉)
docs.text: Associate Professor & Master Supervisor Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications 10 Xitucheng Road, Beijing, China E-mail: yuanquan AT bupt DOT edu DOT cn

docs.title: About me
docs.text: I received Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications (BUPT), China, in 2018. I am currently an associate professor at the State Key Laboratory of Networking and Switching Technology, BUPT. My current research interest includes mobile computing, crowdsensing, and vehicular networks.

docs.title: Notes for Prospective Students
docs.text:
Currently, I have openings for master students to enroll in the fall semester of 2023. Please contact me if you are interested.

Email: yuanquan AT bupt DOT edu DOT cn
